title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.1 - Posting of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.1 - Posting of rules

State Regulations

Such rules for pari-mutuel betting as may be specified
from time to time by the commission shall be reproduced in legible type and
permanently displayed in locations within all betting areas of the premises of
racing associations. The daily racing programs sold to the public by racing
associations shall contain a statement indicating that such rules are posted in
all betting areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4009.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
